item.description:
The date is updated after checking out the race website.

This is an annual event that benefits the Glastonbury High School Crew Team. Non-runners can help the GHS Crew Team by making a donation.

This event is a beautiful 3.1-mile (5K) course run completely along the Connecticut River and farmlands in South Glastonbury.  According to the website, the course is flat except for a downhill at race start and uphill at race end (this is an out-and-back race).

Entry fee is $25 through March, and then goes up as the event gets closer.
item.name: Glastonbury River Run
